summary:
ENB setting. This setting corresponds to ENB v0.266
It is the ENB arrangement for showing scenery as a character finely.
Two versions of original and Lite were prepared.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Thank you very much viewing this mod![/size]


[size=5][u][color=#ffff00]Please download the [/color][url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]ENB v0.266[/url][color=#ffff00] first.[/color][/u][/size]


[size=6][color=lightblue][b]Concept and Features[/b][/color][/size]

[size=3]1.All New HRK ENB. Original Weather esp Included.
2.A setup where a character looks beautifully.
3.Skillful color of the grade which does not become unnatural.
4.Atmosphere is increased in the time zone of sunrise and sunset using a color filter.[/size]



[size=6][color=lightblue][b]Installation[/b][/color][/size]

1.Copy the [color=yellow][u]d3d9.dll and enbhost[/u][/color] files of ENB v0.266 to your Skyrim folder.
2.Copy and paste to your Skyrim folder with manual operation about all the files in a HRK ENB folder.

3.Edit your [color=yellow]enblocal.ini[/color] and set the following values:
[size=4][MEMORY]
[color=yellow]ReservedMemorySizeMb=[/color][color=red]XXXX[/color] --- Please input the amount of RAM which you are reserving.(Default is 1024.)
[color=yellow]VideoMemorySizeMb=[/color][color=red]XXXX[/color] --- Please input the amount of memory of your graphics board. (Default is 2048.)
[/size]
4.Edit your [color=yellow]skyrimprefs.ini[/color] and set the following values:
[size=4][Display]
[color=yellow]bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
iMultiSample=0
bFXAAEnabled=0
iMaxAnisotropy=0

[/color][/size]5.Please turn on one of esp.

[b][color=#ff00ff][size=3]HRK ENB Vanilla[/size][/color][size=3] - For Vanilla only user.

[color=#ff00ff]HRK ENB + DG,HRK ENB + DB[/color] - The user installing one of DLCs

[color=#ff00ff]HRK ENB Vanilla + DG & DB[/color] - The user installing both DLCs


[/size][/b]
[size=6][color=lightblue][b]Uninstallation[/b][/color][/size]

Just delete any files from HRK ENB and d3d9.dll.



[size=6][color=lightblue][b]Highly Recommended Mod[/b][/color][/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17609/?]Relighting Skyrim by NovakDalton[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?]Realistic Water Two by isoku[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48938/?][size=2]Watercolor for ENB and Realistic Water Two[/size] by [b]paganmetalfan[/b][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29253/?]
Remove Interior Fog V2 by rgabriel15[/url]
If you use a COT compatible version　… [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9930/?]Revamped Exterior Fog by Greg Manthey - gargorias[/url]


[size=6][color=lightblue][b]Credits[/b][/color][/size]
[size=2]
[font=Arial]Boris Vorontsov - [url=http://enbdev.com/]ENB Series [/url]developer
Zeroking - ULTIMATE SHADER ADDON for ENB 1.1
Based on Post-Process Effects Addon for ENB
Matso - enbeffectprepass.fx file
kingeric1992 - enblens.fx file
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24235/]Multiple Lens Sun Sprite Shader[/url] by Phinix
Sunsprite texture from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/mods/53521/?]DYNAMO ENB by Courier[/url][/font][/size]


[size=6][color=lightblue][b]My other ENB preset[/b][/color][/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56020/?]AIR ENB[/url]

[img]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-UUCVNxL37Kk/U8d7r-7GM1I/AAAAAAAABB8/Y3WEO9O2UHc/w920-h518-no/ScreenShot5559.jpg[/img]



I'm Japanese. Sorry,my English is not good enough.
